dialogue: *high-pitched sirens start blasting through the control-room speakers*
What on earth? We just stopped the missile??
This isn't the missile alarm - this is the National Emergency alarm..
I guess that implies there is a national emergency...
It would appear that way. I'm getting the satellite imagery up..
*as the satellite imagery appeared on the screen, the room fell silent, apart form the sirens*
*sure enough, a giant Nuclear warhead was flying straight towards London*
I did. Let's get all available obsticales. Walls and all. We can't just let London be destroyed like that!
{userName}, we are all counting on you.
Just another day at the office Sir!
